verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H935>Go<s%> in unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>, Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may serve <S%H5647>me<s%>.
For if you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go<s%>, and will hold them <S%H2388>still<s%>,

<S%H3027>Behold<s%>, the hand of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> upon your <S%H4735>cattle<s%> which is in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, upon the <S%H5483>horses<s%>, upon the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, upon the <S%H1581>camels<s%>, upon the <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and upon the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>: there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H6395>sever<s%> between the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and there shall <S%H1697>nothing<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> of all that is the <S%H1121>children<s%>'s of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a set <S%H4150>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that <S%H1697>thing<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, and all the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>: but of the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, <S%H259>and<s%>, behold, there was not one of the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%>. And the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H3513>hardened<s%>, and he did not let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> to you <S%H2651>handfuls<s%> of <S%H6368>ashes<s%> of the <S%H3536>furnace<s%>, and let <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> it toward the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.

And it shall become small <S%H80>dust<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and shall be a <S%H7822>boil<s%> breaking <S%H6524>forth<s%> with <S%H76>boils<s%> upon <S%H120>man<s%>, and upon <S%H929>animal<s%>, throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6368>ashes<s%> of the <S%H3536>furnace<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it up toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and it became a <S%H7822>boil<s%> breaking <S%H6524>forth<s%> with <S%H76>boils<s%> upon <S%H120>man<s%>, and upon <S%H929>animal<s%>.

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7822>boils<s%>; for the <S%H7822>boil<s%> was upon the <S%H2748>magicians<s%>, and upon all the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and he <S%H8085>listened<s%> not unto <S%H3068>them<s%>; as the Lord had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>, Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may serve <S%H5647>me<s%>.

For I will at this <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> all my <S%H4046>plagues<s%> upon your <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and upon your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and upon your <S%H5971>people<s%>; that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is none like me in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

For now I will stretch <S%H7971>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that I may <S%H5221>strike<s%> you and your <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>; and you shall be cut <S%H3582>off<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And in <S%H199>very<s%> <S%H5668>deed<s%> for this cause have I raised you <S%H5975>up<s%>, for to <S%H7200>show<s%> in you my <S%H3581>power<s%>; and that my <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H5608>declared<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
As yet <S%H5549>exalt<s%> you yourself against my <S%H5971>people<s%>, that you will not let them <S%H7971>go<s%>?

<S%H4279>Behold<s%>, to morrow about this <S%H6256>time<s%> I will cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%>, such as has not <S%H3644>been<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the foundation there even until <S%H3117>now<s%>.

<S%H7971>Send<s%> therefore <S%H5756>now<s%>, and gather your <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, and all that you have in the <S%H7704>field<s%>; for upon every <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal<s%> which shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and shall not be <S%H622>brought<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%>, the <S%H1259>hail<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> upon <S%H4191>them<s%>, and they shall die.

He that <S%H3373>feared<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> among the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> made his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> into the <S%H1004>houses<s%>:
And he that <S%H7760>regarded<s%> not the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, that there may be <S%H1259>hail<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, upon <S%H120>man<s%>, and upon <S%H929>animal<s%>, and upon every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, throughout the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H1259>hail<s%>, and the <S%H784>fire<s%> ran <S%H1980>along<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

So there was <S%H1259>hail<s%>, and <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H8432>mingled<s%> with the <S%H1259>hail<s%>, <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe<s%>, such as there was <S%H3808>none<s%> like it in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> since it became a <S%H1471>nation<s%>.

And the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> all that was in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal<s%>; and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H7665>broke<s%> every <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
Only in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>, where the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1259>were<s%>, was there no hail.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2398>them<s%>, I have sinned this <S%H6471>time<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, and I and my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

<S%H6279>entreat<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> (for it is <S%H7227>enough<s%>) that there be no more <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>thunderings<s%> and <S%H1259>hail<s%>; and I will let you <S%H7971>go<s%>, and you shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> no <S%H3254>longer<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3318>him<s%>, As soon as I am gone out of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, I will spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and the <S%H6963>thunder<s%> shall <S%H2308>cease<s%>, neither shall there be any more <S%H1259>hail<s%>; that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> how that the <S%H776>earth<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s.
But as for you and your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you will not yet <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
And the <S%H6594>flax<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley<s%> was <S%H5221>struck<s%>: for the <S%H8184>barley<s%> was in the <S%H24>ear<s%>, and the <S%H6594>flax<s%> was <S%H1392>blooming<s%>.
But the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and the <S%H3698>rie<s%> were not <S%H5221>struck<s%>: for <S%H2007>they<s%> were not grown <S%H648>up<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and the <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H2308>ceased<s%>, and the <S%H4306>rain<s%> was not <S%H5413>poured<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4306>rain<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunders<s%> were <S%H2308>ceased<s%>, he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> yet <S%H3254>more<s%>, and <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, he and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened<s%>, neither would he let the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>; as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
